title: Mexico Criminalizes Investment
sub_head: President López Obrador threatens to jail opponents of his energy agenda.
body:
President Biden met virtually with Mexican President Andrés Manuel López Obrador on Friday to talk about bilateral and regional issues, according to the White House. Diplomatic gibberish aside, the priority of the call was clear: Both presidents are harmed politically by the mess at the southern U.S. border and want it to go away.
Let’s be honest, though. That’s about the extent of their shared goals.
